@include "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/liamja/Prebake/master/obtrusive.txt" /exclude="../../exclusions.txt"
!
!------- Fixing filering -------
! samsung.com
! example: http://www.samsung.com/ru/support/model/S821GWS/YLP
samsung.com#@#.cookie-warning
! http://forum.adguard.com/showthread.php?10620
vkmag.com#@##cookiesdirective
!-------------------------------
!
